title: The Persistent gum
creator_contributor_role: Tasmanian State Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural resources - Environmental aspects
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Forest ecology - Australia
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Environmental education
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Forest fires - Prevention and control

description: Short film on eucalypt strategies for coping with environmental stress, mainly fire. Useful introduction to this topic, which is an imnportant factor in forest ecology. Some terms may need to be explained prior to showing. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
